SELECT
holder.auth ,holder.m_number AS phone ,holder.user_srl AS userSrl ,holder.user_name AS userName
manager.auth ,manager.m_number AS phone ,manager.user_srl AS userSrl ,manager.user_name AS userName
,COUNT(o.obj_srl) AS totalObjCnt FROM users AS manager INNER JOIN obj AS o ON manager.user_srl = o.user_srl INNER JOIN users AS holder ON manager.master_srl = holder.user_srl
WHERE manager.master_srl = ${userSrl} AND o.obj_status IN ('inner_wait','return_finish')
WHERE manager.user_srl = #{userSrl} AND o.obj_status IN ('outer_wait','release_finish','release_start','return_start','return_wait')

SELECT u.user_srl AS userSrl, u.user_name AS userName, u.auth, IFNULL(assetCnt.totalObjCnt,0) AS totalObjCnt FROM users AS u LEFT JOIN obj AS o ON u.user_srl = o.user_srl LEFT JOIN ( SELECT u.user_srl AS userSrl, COUNT(o.obj_srl) AS totalObjCnt FROM users AS u INNER JOIN obj AS o ON u.user_srl = o.user_srl WHERE u.master_srl = #{userSrl} AND auth != 'holder' AND o.obj_status IN ('outer_wait','release_finish','release_start','return_start','return_wait') )AS assetCnt ON assetCnt.userSrl = u.user_srl WHERE u.master_srl = #{userSrl} AND auth != 'holder' GROUP BY u.user_srl
ORDER BY u.create_at DESC
ORDER BY u.user_name ASC
ORDER BY assetCnt.totalObjCnt DESC

manager.auth

ORDER BY o.create_at DESC LIMIT #{limitcount},#{contentnum}
